name: Real Rash Flying Copter
description:
TAP TAP TAP!!!

US Air force has given you special tasks to fetch militants that are missing. Its your job now to bring all of them. Mission is not easy as you have to go through magma mountains full of dangerous pikes and boiling magma. You need to stay alert of incoming missiles.

Rash Driving like never before, but wait.... its not driving rather its flying. Its a flying copter almost crash landing on hot magma and boiling lava

TAP to move up and avoid incoming missiles. Catch as many coins as you can and finish all the missions. You are the captain of the copter and you need to make sure that chopper lands safely after finishing all the missions.

US Air force has given you special tasks to fetch militants that are missing. Its your job now to bring all of them. Mission is not easy as you have to go through magma mountains full of dangerous pikes and boiling magma. You need to stay alert of incoming missiles.

Good luck soldier.
